# Build Vault

> Track every modification, receipt, and dollar spent on your project car.

## Overview

Build Vault is an iOS app built by car enthusiasts, for car enthusiasts. It helps you document your entire vehicle build journey—from bolt-ons to full engine swaps—keeping every modification, cost, and photo organized in one place. Never forget what you did, when you did it, or how much it actually cost.

## Features

- Track Every Mod: Log modifications with part numbers, vendors, install dates, costs, and before-and-after photos
- Monitor Your Investment: See exactly how much you've invested, broken down by category
- Generate Build Sheets: Create professional PDFs for car shows, insurance claims, or selling your vehicle
- VIN Decode Your Specs: Enter your VIN to pull factory specs including stock horsepower, torque, weight, and drivetrain
- Log Dyno Runs: Track dyno results, drag times, boost levels, and weight over time
- Document Storage: Store registrations, titles, insurance cards, invoices, and service records with expiration alerts
- AI Invoice Scanning: Automatically extract data from receipts and invoices
- iCloud Sync: Keep your data synced across all your devices

## Pricing

- Free Tier: 1 vehicle, 15 mods per vehicle, 1 photo per mod, 2 build sheet exports/month, 20 documents total
- Pro Tier: Unlimited vehicles, unlimited mods, 10 photos per mod, unlimited exports, unlimited documents, AI invoice scanning, iCloud sync
